Text:
This file has swedish subs inside the episodes (as part of them), so they can not be removed.
Why not make it with subtitles in separate file, so people are able to watch Atlantis without swedish subs?

Well, if they don't want Swedish subs they should download a torrent which isn't named "SWESUB". The uploader of this torrent have made it pretty clear that this torrent have Swedish subtitles, so stop complaining.

For a DVDRip:

A:5

V:6

Thank you for the UL!
